about_the_game:
2 Years anniversary, get SUPER Cute Alien Legacy Edition for free!

1-4 players platformer about friendship, love and what it means to be human. Adventure, action and puzzles, contrasting cute and gore effects, also including RPG elements.

This game was first released on 2018, under the title “SUPER Cute Alien”. However, in 2021, the game underwent a major overhaul and was renamed “PROTOCOL 11”. The new version of the game added new graphics, gameplay features, and a revamped story that explored themes of friendship, love, and what it means to be human.

SUPER Cute Alien is a winner of the #Potenciate contest, a national competition that supports and promotes the development of video games in Argentina.

Currently featuring multiple game modes, 1-4 players:

  • Story mode (Solo or Coop).
  • Local multiplayer Versus: Last One Standing, Survival, Battle Royale

IMPORTANT:

- In order to run this game, find SUPER Cute Alien Legacy folder and run SUPER Cute Alien.exe


- Joysticks are required for local multiplayer.

name: PROTOCOL 11 - SUPER Cute Alien Legacy Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHZ
  • Graphics: 256 VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: 1-4 players sci-fi adventure about friendship, love and what it means to be human. Featuring local multiplayer with Coop and Versus mode against your friends!
